summary: The comment section is highly polarized with a strong presence of national pride, particularly from Turkish and Pakistani users, alongside significant criticism and sarcasm directed towards India. There's a notable amount of toxicity, with many comments expressing anger and mockery. The discussion revolves around geopolitical tensions, religious solidarity, and a tourism boycott, reflecting deep-seated animosities and alliances.
title: Indiaâ€™s MELTDOWN Against Turkey
